#if defined(USE_TEX_ADDR)
extern unsigned short cursor_med_lut[];
extern unsigned char cursor_med_tex[];
void *cursor_med_tex_addr[] = {
#if defined(NON_PALETTE)
	0,
#else
	cursor_med_lut,
#endif
#if defined(NON_TEXTURE)
	0,
#else
	cursor_med_tex,
#endif
};
#endif

#if defined(USE_TEX_SIZE)
unsigned short cursor_med_tex_size[] = { 64, 64, 4, 1, };
#endif

#if !defined(NON_PALETTE)
unsigned short cursor_med_lut[] = {
0xf83e,0x1085,0x2109,0x318d,0x4211,0x5295,0x6319,0x739d,0x8c63,0x9ce7,0xad6b,0xbdef,0xce73,0xdef7,0xef7b,0xffff,

#endif
